properties.entry: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( INQ_NO , MEM_NO , INQ_NAME , INQ_QUESTION , INQ_DATE , INQ_ANSWER , INQ_PROCESSING , INQ_PRIVATE , INQ_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_INQ_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT , NULL , DEFAULT , ? , DEFAULT )
SELECT INQ_NO , INQ_NAME , INQ_PROCESSING , MEM_ID , INQ_DATE , INQ_QUESTION , INQ_ANSWER , INQ_PRIVATE FROM TB_INQUIRY I JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (I.MEM_NO=M.MEM_NO) ORDER BY INQ_NO DESC
